trans-unit.source: 113 - The source and destination files are the same file.

trans-unit.source: You should use fully-qualified path names with this function. Using it with relative path names is not thread safe.

seg-source.mrk: You should use fully-qualified path names with this function.
Using it with relative path names is not thread safe.

Using it with relative path names is not thread safe.
